Top-3 Similar Questions: au_1060147: How can I adjust the screen brightness in i3wm on Ubuntu 16.04?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_1060147: bindsym XF86MonBrightnessUp exec xbacklight -inc 10
bindsym XF86MonBrightnessDown exec xbacklight -dec 10

Explanations about Options.-dec: Decreases brightness by the specified amount.
Explanations about Options.-inc: Increases brightness by the specified amount.

Top-3 Similar Questions: so_45371269: What's best linux App to adjust the screen's color temperature
Top-3 Scripts: so_45371269: redshift -O <desired color temperature in K>

Explanations about Options.-O:
One-shot manual mode (set color temperature). Use this with the -P option to clear
 the existing gamma ramps before applying the new color temperature.

Answers.MP Summary: a program to send desktop notifications

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_1032945: How do I adjust screen brightness when using a different environment from GNOME/Unity on Ubuntu 18.04?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_1032945: # my i3 config is at ~/.config/i3/config
# increase screen brightness with notification
bindsym XF86MonBrightnessUp exec "light -A 5; notify-send 'brightness up'"
# decrease screen brightness with notification
bindsym XF86MonBrightnessDown exec "light -U 5; notify-send 'brightness down'"
